name: Feral Hunter
movement: 30 feet speed, navigates difficult terrain easily
description: The Feral Hunter is a Medium fey creature that boasts agility and stealth, wearing leather armor and possessing sharp piercing weapons. Its keen senses and adaptability make it a lethal predator in natural terrain.
memorable: Its ability to evade attacks while dealing enhanced damage with piercing weapons makes it both a cunning hunter and an elusive target.
goals: To hunt prey in natural environments, using stealth and precision.
relations: Often associated with the wilderness and the fey realm, it may serve fey lords or act independently as a protector of natural spaces.
environment: Commonly found in forests or wilderness areas, thriving in natural terrains.
strengths: High Dexterity and enhanced senses for stealth and precision attacks.
weaknesses: Average physical strength and constitution limits its resilience against brute force.
attacks: Utilizes a Hunting Knife for melee and a Longbow for ranged attacks, both capable of dealing significant piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Precise ability allows for extra damage on piercing attacks, increasing overall lethality.
senses: Heightened senses with a Perception score of 19, allowing it to detect hidden threats effectively.
skills: Skilled in Stealth, making it very adept at moving undetected in natural environments.
additional_information: Resistance to charmed and unconscious conditions.
Ability to mark quarry for additional damage.
Can reposition without provoking opportunity attacks when damaged.
Effective multiattack capability with melee and ranged options.
test_queries: stealthy fey hunter in the woods
mobile fey that excels in natural terrain
hunter with evasive abilities and marked quarry
